page.title: 06THE VILLAGE SHOP
page.content:
THIS VILLAGE SHOP GETS ABOUT{150-200 CUSTOMERS A DAY.MOST PEOPLE COME FROM THE VILLAGE BUT SOME COME FROM ELSE WHERE.SOME PEOPLE BUY THE COMPLETE RANGE OF GOODS,OTHERS JUST POP IN FOR THE ODD THING THEY'VE FORGOTTEN.
THE GOODS AT THIS PARTICULAR SHOP ARE DELIVERED MOSTLY ON A MONDAY.FRUIT AND VEGETABLES COME IN ON A REGULAR BASES OF THREE TIMES A WEEK. CIGARETTES, CONFECTIONERY AND SWEETS COME IN 2-3 TIMES A WEEK.BREAD,MEAT AND FROZEN FOOD COME IN ONCE EACH WEEK.
THIS PARTICULAR SHOP KEEPER GETS UP ABOUT{7.00am}IN THE MORNING TO GET THE SHOP READY AND SHUTS DOWN ABOUT {5.00pm.}THIS SHOP KEEPER DELIVERS TO A LOT OF PEOPLE.HE ALSO DELIVERS WEDDING CAKES TO PEOPLE WHO WANT THEM.
